awards.title: Best Paper Award
awards.awarder: World Conference on eXplainable Articial Intelligence (xAI 2023)
awards.summary: iPDP: On Partial Dependence Plots in Dynamic Modeling Scenarios

publications.name: shapiq: Shapley Interactions for Machine Learning
publications.summary: Package paper presenting Shapley interactions for machine learning and extending the popular shap package with feature interactions.

publications.name: KernelSHAP-IQ: Weighted Least Square Optimization for Shapley Interactions
publications.summary: In this paper we present an extension of KernelSHAP to Shapley Interactions and establish a weighted least-squares representation of the Shapley interaction index.

publications.name: Beyond TreeSHAP:Efficient Computation of Any-Order Shapley Interactions for Tree Ensembles
publications.summary: In this paper we present an extension of TreeSHAP for Shapley Interactions that works for any tree-based model.

publications.name: SHAP-IQ: Unified Approximation of any-order Shapley Interactions
publications.summary: In this paper we present a unified approximation method for Shapley interactions.

publications.name: Incremental permutation feature importance (iPFI): towards online explanations on data streams
publications.summary: In this paper we present an efficient computation of PFI on evolving data streams and establish important theoretical results.

publications.name: iSAGE: An Incremental Version of SAGE for Online Explanation on Data Streams
publications.summary: In this paper we present an efficient computation of SAGE on evolving data streams.

publications.name: iPDP: On Partial Dependence Plots in Dynamic Modeling Scenarios
publications.publisher: World Conference on eXplainable Artificial Intelligence (xAI 2023)
publications.summary: In this paper we present an approach to compute PDPs efficiently in dynamically evolving environments, such as online learning on data streams.

projects.name: shapiq
projects.summary: Shapley interactions for Machine Learning & Extension of shap
